content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: white_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "glass", "quantity": 8, "index": 14}, {"type": "diamond_leggings", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 24, "index": 24}, {"type": "cobblestone_slab", "quantity": 23, "index": 29}, {"type": "iron_shovel", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "lily_of_the_valley", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 44, "index": 37}]

thought: To craft white_stained_glass, I need to first craft white_dye. White_dye requires lily_of_the_valley, which is in slot 36. Therefore, I will move lily_of_the_valley from slot 36 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
